mapper.sql: create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time, is_deleted, id, school_id, year_level_id, quarter, job_fair_title, job_fair_content, start_time, end_time, status
mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT ct.id year_id, ct.type_name year_name, cj.id, cj.quarter, cj.job_fair_title title, cj.job_fair_content content, cj.start_time, cj.end_time, cj.status FROM crim_type ct INNER JOIN crim_job_fair cj ON ct.id = cj.year_level_id AND cj.is_deleted = 0 WHERE ct.pid = 5 AND ct.is_deleted = 0 ) t1 ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT ct.id year_id, ct.type_name year_name, cj.id, cj.job_fair_title title, cj.quarter, cj.start_time, cj.end_time, cj.status FROM crim_type ct INNER JOIN crim_job_fair cj ON ct.id = cj.year_level_id AND cj.is_deleted = 0 AND cj.status = 1 WHERE ct.pid = 5 AND ct.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY cj.start_time DESC
